content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Basic Processing Unit at position (1.0, 1.0) / (2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (2.5, 2.5)

### Steam Power Plant at position (8.5, 10.5) / (11.5, 14.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (8.5, 10.5)
- Boiler at position (11.5, 14.0)
- Electricity Group formed by poles at positions (12.5, 10.5), (10.5, 8.5) and (12.5, 9.5)

### Offshore Pump Assembly
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (–1.5, 28.5) [Status: WORKING]
- Offshore Pump at position (0.5, 30.5) [Status: NOT CONNECTED]

### Pipe Network Systems
Consists of the following PipeGroup entities:
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5451) at position (7.5, 13.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5455) at position (12.5, 12.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5458) at position (9.5, 15.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5461) at position (13.5, 17.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5462) at position (1.5, 19.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5463) at position (3.5, 19.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5464) at position (5.5, 19.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5474) at position (9.5, 19.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5466) at position (–4.5, 20.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5467) at position (–2.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5468) at position (3.5, 21.5) with fluid=water [Status: FULL_OUTPUT]
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5480) at position (3.5, 27.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5482) at position (–0.5, 29.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=5484) at position (1.5, 28.5)

### Laboratory Unit
Consists of the following entity:
- Lab (associated with electrical_id=1281) currently without power

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• Issues with water-carrying PipeGroup searches using explicit string matching:
  - Repeated attempts with various fluid_system identifiers (4352, 4446, 4538, 4632, 4724, 4818, 4910, 5004, 5096, 5190, 5282, 5376) resulted in errors stating that no suitable water-carrying PipeGroup was found.
  - Ensure that a properly configured water-carrying PipeGroup is present and within reach before initiating a search using explicit string matching.
  - Validate the fluid_system numbers and the existence of water in the targeted PipeGroups prior to executing the matching search.
